items.sentence: She explained to him why she was late for his party.
I don\'t feel well. Could you give me some medicine?
It\'s not a good idea to ask a woman how old she is.
I hope that you won\'t make the same mistake as Tom.
I know that most people here don\'t like doing that.
Tom lied when he told Mary that he had won the race.
Tom likes to eat mashed potatoes with lots of gravy.
Tom never complains, no matter how hard the work is.
Tom never even saw a computer until he was thirteen.
Tom reminded Mary that she needed to buy some bread.
Tom thought Cookie would be a good name for his dog.
Tom thought about it and agreed that Mary was right.
Tom thought he was doing what Mary wanted him to do.
Tom thought it would be a good idea to see a doctor.
Tom thought that Mary was asking too many questions.
Tom thought that Mary was hiding something from him.
I\'ll see if Tom knows how to program in JavaScript.
I\'m beginning to regret not studying French harder.
I\'m doing my best to get everything done by Monday.
Tom and Mary always play tennis on Saturday morning.
